Articles.Content:
Hello.

Today after extensive rescue mission I decided to finally launch a scanner.

Here is my satellite : (Craft file : [http://s000.tinyupload.com/download.php?file_id=74323748051752969862&t=7432374805175296986234877](http://s000.tinyupload.com/download.php?file_id=74323748051752969862&t=7432374805175296986234877) )

![CAReFRl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CAReFRl.jpg)

I went into Polar Orbit, Started scan, energy depleted at 96% scan, but that was not a problem with the solar panels open, so 2 ticks later I had the data being fully transmitted.

I got a weird overlay, but it may only be weird to me as new feature.

Then I went to space center and was thinking about what next thing to get to. Saw I have "Science from around Kerbin" contract and went to Tracking station, switched to my satellite just to see this : 

![FCCPlC5.png](http://i.imgur.com/FCCPlC5.png)

P.S.: The scanner is root part.
This should be fixed in the latest update, 1.0.2, but as a precaution it is advised to *not* use a scanner as a root part.
I had to load a previous save, changing the root part and seems that it worked for now. Thank you for the fast response. I have to update my KSP anyway.
